Write-Up Text: People have taken to social media to express their thoughts on the upcoming federal budget in Australia. In one post concerns are raised about the Albanese government prioritizing defense over social welfare calling for balance through the #RaiseTheRate movement. Another post praises the leadership of Mark Butler in proposing a major crackdown on e-cigarettes in the budget. The budget's correlation with a decrease in household savings is questioned while the oil and gas industry's failure to pay taxes and royalties is criticized. The need for urgent action to address stagnating wages and support struggling communities is stressed. Other posts debate the marginalisation of disability issues and inaction on environmental transitions.
